mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T_PAY_ORDER_LIST_HIS SELECT ID, CHNL_ID, PAY_SERVIC_TYPE, MER_DATE, MER_SEQ, MER_NO, SEC_MER_NO, OUTER_ORDER_NO, OUTER_ORDER_START_DATE, OUTER_ORDER_END_DATE, ORDER_TYPE, PAY_TYPE, ORDER_NO, ORDER_NAME, TRANS_CODE, USER_ID, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_TIME, ORDER_LMT_TIME, CURR, TRANS_AMT, OTHER_TRAN_AMT, PRODUCT_AMT, MER_FEE_AMT, FEE_AMT, ORI_DATE, ORI_ORDER_NO, EJECT_AMT, ORDER_STAT, SPBILL_CREATE_IP, NOTIFY_URL, RETURN_URL, TRANS_COMMENTS, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, REMARK1, REMARK2, REMARK3, CHK_FLAG, CHK_BATCH_NO, STL_FLAG, CHK_DATE, STL_BATCH_NO, STL_DATE, ORDER_DES, OPEN_ID, PAY_TIME, PAY_ACCT_NO, TRANS_TYPE, CLEAR_FLAG, CLEAR_BATCH_NO, CLEAR_DATE, SEC_MER_FEE_AMT, EXTENSION_PARTY, ROUTE_CODE FROM T_PAY_ORDER_LISTã€€ WHERE
ORDER_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
